q: perfect ending. Allen Iverson sank the first buzzer-beating shot of his nine-year career, a 14-footer in overtime, and scored 15 points to lead the Philadelphia 76ers to a 106-104 victory over the Indiana Pacers on Friday night. It's a great feeling to hit a shot with no time on the clock, said Allen Iverson , who sank a halfcourt winner for the US Olympic team against Germany in an exhibition game. Allen Iverson is getting used to dramatic shots. He sent a game into overtime in the final seconds earlier this

Providing Vermont and other states with the flexibility to build upon health care reform will result in better care and greater access at a lower cost. Allowing us to become a laboratory for innovation and excellence will help Vermonters, while once again allowing us to lead the way.
